items.content_html:
See the final output: 

Today, I am analyzing existing research on water quality, evaluating model performances, comparing hybrid models with base models, and formulating an innovative solution for water quality anomaly detection.

Goal: By the end of the day, I will have a comprehensive understanding of water quality research, model performance comparisons, and a well-documented draft outlining an innovative solution for anomaly detection.

Hourly Research Plan:

From 8:00 to 9:00 AM, I am setting up my research by defining search queries, gathering relevant papers from Google Scholar, and organizing them in a reference manager like Zotero or Mendeley.

From 9:00 to 10:30 AM, I will conduct a literature review, identifying advancements in water quality research, taking structured notes, and using ChatGPT and NotebookLM to summarize key concepts.

At 10:30 AM, I will take a short break for midday prayer and hydration.

From 11:00 AM to 12:30 PM, I will evaluate model performance, reviewing existing ML/DL techniques, comparing accuracy and efficiency, and identifying strengths and weaknesses.

At 12:30 PM, I will take a lunch break to recharge.

From 1:30 to 3:00 PM, I will analyze hybrid models versus base models, comparing their effectiveness and identifying advantages and challenges with the help of AI tools.

At 3:00 PM, I will take a short break for afternoon prayer and relaxation.

From 3:30 to 5:00 PM, I will brainstorm and draft an innovative solution for anomaly detection, identifying potential algorithms and outlining implementation challenges.

From 5:00 to 6:00 PM, I will begin writing in Overleaf (LaTeX), documenting research findings, and drafting the methodology section.

At 6:00 PM, I will take a break for dinner and evening prayer.

From 7:00 to 9:00 PM, I will refine and structure the paper, finalizing research findings, formatting references in LaTeX (BibTeX), and reviewing key sections.

From 9:00 to 10:00 PM, I will reflect on progress, plan follow-up research, and complete night prayer.

From 10:00 to 11:00 PM, I will proofread the document, ensure clarity, and prepare for the next research session before resting.
